description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent to generate and print a response to a prompt using the agno framework, specifically utilizing the xAI model.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class used to interact with the AI model.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Event class representing a response chunk from the agent.

classes.name: xAI
classes.description: A class representing the xAI model used by the agent.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
